notes: A special prepared Custom DPA Handler for updating IQRF OS and DPA.

standards.name: Embed: Coordinator
standards.notes:
Added SmartConnect support for DPA > 3.02.
DiscoveredDevices_Response and BondedDevices_Response ignore addresses above 239.
Added SetMID.

TestRfSignal added
